ingredients.ingredient: 1 (15 ounce) can kidney beans, drained and rinsed
1 (15 ounce) can pinto beans, drained and rinsed
1 (1 ounce) package buttermilk ranch dressing mix

cookingTips: Brown ground beef in a skillet first, then drain fat before adding to slow cooker for cleaner flavor
Crush whole peeled tomatoes slightly by hand to distribute them evenly throughout the soup
Cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 3-4 hours, allowing flavors to meld and develop
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the slow cooker method for hands-off cooking. Suggest toppings like tortilla strips, sour cream, and cheese for customization.
